// Submitted by alpha_x

#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n, k;
        cin >> n >> k;
        int monster[n];
        int sum(0);
        for(int i=0; i<n; ++i)
        {
            cin >> monster[i];
        }
        for(int i=0; i<n; ++i)
        {
            if((monster[i]+k)%7 == 0)
                ++sum;
        }
        cout << sum << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
